snippet: A run of poor job reports has raised concerns about the United States economy, but one economist says a June increase in wages and total hours worked may indicate that consumer spending, which has lagged recently, is recovering. And the Organization...
lead_paragraph: A run of poor job reports has raised concerns about the United States economy, but one economist says a June increase in wages and total hours worked may indicate that consumer spending, which has lagged recently, is recovering. And the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development forecast this week that the United States unemployment rate was likely to continue declining while similar rates would rise in many other developed countries.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: A Little Light Amid the Gloom
headline.main: Off the Charts: A Little Light Amid the Gloom
